short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add 2FA security to your accounts and generate codes in Chrome with Web2FA Authenticator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of taking out your phone when you sign in? Dead Phone?

Web2FA lets you easily add 2FA (two factor authentication) security to your accounts without compromising on convenience, all within your browser

You can simultaneously add accounts to Web2FA and your phone!
